metadata.Title: CVE-2023-22602 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: When using Apache Shiro before 1.11.0 together with Spring Boot 2.6+, a specially crafted HTTP request may cause an authentication bypass. The authentication bypass occurs when Shiro and Spring Boot are using different pattern-matching techniques. Both Shiro and Spring Boot < 2.6 default to Ant style pattern matching. Mitigation: Update to Apache Shiro 1.11.0, or set the following Spring Boot configuration value: `spring.mvc.pathmatch.matching-strategy = ant_path_matcher`

criterions.comment: shiro package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
